text: I slept soundly, and much later than I should. It was already after six when I awoke, and the sun was nearly setting beyond the west window. Downstairs I could hear the murmur of voices, and knew they were back. I wondered, as I wrapped a sarong around my waist, if Nigel at all resented being deprived of his afternoon sleep.
